select.if: select sc.*, tp.id as type_id, lc.id as car_id, tp.name as belong, lc.number, lc.is_in_use as car_is_in_use, lc.is_disable as car_is_disable, lc.create_time as car_create_time, lc.update_time as car_update_time, lc.max_load, lc.max_space, co.id as courier_id, co.is_disable as courier_is_disable, co.is_in_use as courier_is_in_use, co.create_time as courier_create_time, co.update_time as courier_update_time, GetUsernameByUserInfoId(co.user_info_id) as username from t_logistics_center sc left join t_logistics_courier co on co.logistic_id=sc.id left join t_logistics_car lc on sc.id=lc.logistic_id left join t_logistics_type tp on lc.type_id=tp.id and co.type_id=tp.id where tp.id=1 and sc.is_disable=0 and lc.is_in_use=0 and lc.is_disable=0 and co.is_disable=0 and co.is_in_use=0 and sc.area_id=#{areaId}

select sc.*, tp.id as type_id, lc.id as car_id, tp.name as belong, lc.number, lc.is_in_use as car_is_in_use, lc.is_disable as car_is_disable, lc.create_time as car_create_time, lc.update_time as car_update_time, lc.max_load, lc.max_space, co.id as courier_id, co.is_disable as courier_is_disable, co.is_in_use as courier_is_in_use, co.create_time as courier_create_time, co.update_time as courier_update_time, GetUsernameByUserInfoId(co.user_info_id) as username from t_logistics_station sc left join t_logistics_courier co on co.logistic_id=sc.id left join t_logistics_car lc on sc.id=lc.logistic_id left join t_logistics_type tp on lc.type_id=tp.id and co.type_id=tp.id where tp.id=2 and sc.is_disable=0 and lc.is_in_use=0 and lc.is_disable=0 and co.is_disable=0 and co.is_in_use=0 and sc.area_id=#{areaId}
